channel.title: Port forwarding
channel.description:
All day I've been playing with programs and asking for help, can someone with knowledge of port forwarding please help me!
I cant forward ports, at all, like they are being blocked by something but i'm not sure what. Firewalls are off, uninstalled if you'd like haha. I really want this to work.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2009, 06:58:05 am[/size][hr]I took my router out and connected my pc directly to the modem, it fixed the problem but I need the router.. maybe thats helpful?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2009, 07:35:30 am[/size][hr]i tired setting up a static ip address and forwarding ports again using instructions from portforward.com or whatever it's called and i still cant open ports! AHH!! and still no reply from anyone, cant anyone fix ittttttt

item.title: Port forwarding
item.dc:creator: @JarenHort JarenHort
item.description:
@JarenHort wrote:

I’ve sent you a PM. If you didn’t get it, add me on MSN and I’ll fix it for you.

Read full topic
